name: portworx-prometheus
description:
Prometheus on DC/OS with Portworx as the persistent Volume provider 

Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/prometheus/0.1.1-2.3.2/
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 2 agent nodes each with: 2.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 25000 MB Disk.

Portworx should be installed on the DC/OS private agents in order to provision portworx volumes for this framework
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Prometheus is being installed!

	Issues: support@portworx.com
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Prometheus is being uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
